content:
Posted: November 3, 2016
												This game looked fun and unique. I saw the reviews and found that Windows Central rated it 4/5 for the XBox. So for under $5 I decided to give it a try....and I'm glad I did. Frantic, Crazy, Chaotic, Frustrating. I kept dying....and dying....and dying. But, I kept trying....and trying....just one more level...one more....one more. Crazy Fun Game....even has a global leaderboard.
